sentences.en: According to Marx , the ontological dimension is original and these two dimensions are based on praxis.
sentences.cn: 其中本体论维度是始源性的,而这两个维度统一在实践的基础上.

sentences.en: But the praxis of dispute did not achieve the response of theory.
sentences.cn: 然而实践的争论并未获得理论的积极回应.

sentences.en: It can be described as praxis, critical pedagogy, or critical action research.
sentences.cn: 可以把它称为“批判性教学法”,“批判性行动研究”, 或(哲学意义上的)“实践”.

sentences.en: Maintain free space for academic research and praxis!
sentences.cn: 维持学术研究与实践的自由空间!

sentences.en: Non - economical praxis is not derived from productive labor.
sentences.cn: 非经济的实践不是从生产劳动中派生出来的,而是相反.

sentences.en: Philosophy of praxis not only indicates the way out for philosophy, but also reflects its nature.
sentences.cn: 实践哲学不仅指示了哲学的出路, 还体现了它的根本性质.

sentences.en: Praxis: Practice, especially of an art, science, or technical occupation, opposite to theory.
sentences.cn: 实践: 实际履行, 尤指艺术.科学或技术领域: 与理论遥相对应.

sentences.en: Through some cases the author will try to explain how the praxis in EC is.
sentences.cn: 本文试图通过若干案例,说明一般法律原则在共同体司法实践中的运用.

sentences.en: Translation study undergoes a turning point from praxis philosophy to rational philosophy.
sentences.cn: 摘要翻译研究正在经历从实践哲学向理论哲学的转向.

trans.tran_en: the practice and practical side of a profession or field of study, as opposed to the theory
